messages.title: Dear %constituency%
messages.content: On Thursday, Scottish families face a choice between a Labour or a Tory government. Every %politicalParty% vote will help to deliver a Labour government is to Vote Labour.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Barn exploitation, zero-hours contracts, raise the minimum wage to above £8
Recruit 1,000 more nurses for the Scottish NHS, funded by a UK-wide mansion tax
Guarantee a job; training or an apprenticeship for our young people

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can stop the Tories being the largest party and stop the SNP putting us on the road to a second referendum.

issues.economy: Barn exploitation, zero-hours contracts, raise the minimum wage to above £8
issues.health: Recruit 1,000 more nurses for the Scottish NHS, funded by a UK-wide mansion tax

quotes.text: This election is the closest thing to investing in generations. Only Labour can stop the Tories being the largest party and stop the SNP putting us on the road to a second referendum.
